@@ -0,0 +1,72 @@
+/*
+ * Copyright (c) 2022, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+ * DO NOT ALTER OR REMOVE COPYRIGHT NOTICES OR THIS FILE HEADER.
+ *
+ * This code is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it
+ * under the terms of the GNU General Public License version 2 only, as
+ * published by the Free Software Foundation.
+ *
+ * This code is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT
+ * ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or
+ * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the GNU General Public License
+ * version 2 for more details (a copy is included in the LICENSE file that
+ * accompanied this code).
+ *
+ * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License version
+ * 2 along with this work; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation,
+ * Inc., 51 Franklin St, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301 USA.
+ *
+ * Please contact Oracle, 500 Oracle Parkway, Redwood Shores, CA 94065 USA
+ * or visit www.oracle.com if you need additional information or have any
+ * questions.
+ */
+
+import org.testng.annotations.DataProvider;
+import org.testng.annotations.Test;
+
+import java.util.HashMap;
+
+import static org.testng.Assert.*;
+
+/*
+ * @test
+ * @bug 8285405
+ * @summary Tests HashMap.newHashMap(int) method
+ * @run testng NewHashMap
+ */
+public class NewHashMap {
+    private static final Class<IllegalArgumentException> IAE = IllegalArgumentException.class;
+
+    @DataProvider(name = "negatives")
+    private static Object[][] negatives() {
+        return new Object[][]{new Object[]{-1},
+                new Object[]{Integer.MIN_VALUE},
+                new Object[]{-42}};
+    }
+
+    @DataProvider(name = "nonNegatives")
+    private static Object[][] nonNegatives() {
+        return new Object[][]{new Object[]{0},
+                new Object[]{42}};
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Test the {@link HashMap#newHashMap(int)} method with negative values
+     * passed for the {@code numMappings} parameter
+     */
+    @Test(dataProvider = "negatives")
+    public void testNewHashMapNegative(final int val) {
+        assertThrows(IAE, () -> HashMap.newHashMap(val));
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Test the {@link HashMap#newHashMap(int)} method with zero and positive values
+     * passed for the {@code numMappings} parameter
+     */
+    @Test(dataProvider = "nonNegatives")
+    public void testNewHashMapNonNegative(final int val) {
+        var h = HashMap.newHashMap(val);
+        assertNotNull(h);
+        assertEquals(h.size(), 0, "Unexpected size of HashMap created with numMappings: " + val);
+    }
+}
\ No newline at end of file

+
+import org.testng.annotations.DataProvider;
+import org.testng.annotations.Test;
+
+import java.util.HashSet;
+
+import static org.testng.Assert.*;
+
+/*
+ * @test
+ * @bug 8285405
+ * @summary Tests HashSet.newHashSet(int) method
+ * @run testng NewHashSet
+ */
+public class NewHashSet {
+    private static final Class<IllegalArgumentException> IAE = IllegalArgumentException.class;
+
+    @DataProvider(name = "negatives")
+    private static Object[][] negatives() {
+        return new Object[][]{new Object[]{-1},
+                new Object[]{Integer.MIN_VALUE},
+                new Object[]{-42}};
+    }
+
+    @DataProvider(name = "nonNegatives")
+    private static Object[][] nonNegatives() {
+        return new Object[][]{new Object[]{0},
+                new Object[]{42}};
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Test the {@link HashSet#newHashSet(int)} method with negative values
+     * passed for the {@code numElements} parameter
+     */
+    @Test(dataProvider = "negatives")
+    public void testNewHashSetNegative(final int val) {
+        assertThrows(IAE, () -> HashSet.newHashSet(val));
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Test the {@link HashSet#newHashSet(int)} method with zero and positive values
+     * passed for the {@code numElements} parameter
+     */
+    @Test(dataProvider = "nonNegatives")
+    public void testNewHashSetNonNegative(final int val) {
+        var h = HashSet.newHashSet(val);
+        assertNotNull(h);
+        assertEquals(h.size(), 0, "Unexpected size of HashSet created with numElements: " + val);
+    }
+}

+import org.testng.annotations.DataProvider;
+import org.testng.annotations.Test;
+
+import java.util.WeakHashMap;
+
+import static org.testng.Assert.*;
+
+/*
+ * @test
+ * @bug 8285405
+ * @summary Tests WeakHashMap.newWeakHashMap(int) method
+ * @run testng NewWeakHashMap
+ */
+public class NewWeakHashMap {
+    private static final Class<IllegalArgumentException> IAE = IllegalArgumentException.class;
+
+    @DataProvider(name = "negatives")
+    private static Object[][] negatives() {
+        return new Object[][]{new Object[]{-1},
+                new Object[]{Integer.MIN_VALUE},
+                new Object[]{-42}};
+    }
+
+    @DataProvider(name = "nonNegatives")
+    private static Object[][] nonNegatives() {
+        return new Object[][]{new Object[]{0},
+                new Object[]{42}};
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Test the {@link WeakHashMap#newWeakHashMap(int)} method with negative values
+     * passed for the {@code numMappings} parameter
+     */
+    @Test(dataProvider = "negatives")
+    public void testNewWeakHashMapNegative(final int val) {
+        assertThrows(IAE, () -> WeakHashMap.newWeakHashMap(val));
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Test the {@link WeakHashMap#newWeakHashMap(int)} method with zero and positive values
+     * passed for the {@code numMappings} parameter
+     */
+    @Test(dataProvider = "nonNegatives")
+    public void testNewWeakHashMapNonNegative(final int val) {
+        var w = WeakHashMap.newWeakHashMap(val);
+        assertNotNull(w);
+        assertEquals(w.size(), 0, "Unexpected size of WeakHashMap created with numMappings: " + val);
+    }
+}
